title: Getting error during game loading and leaverbustered because of it...
body: Every now and then i get a leaver buster LOW PRIORITY QUEUE because when i'm loading, the client has an error... then i have to spend 100 minutes just waiting to to play and to be out of low priority queue... can someone just take the damn penalty off of my aco%%%% please?! I've dealt with this about 4 times in the last week and it's getting a bit ridiculous.

replies.body:
IT JUST DID IT AGAIN. I'VE MANAGED TO PLAY 1 GAME IN THE LAST HOUR AND A HALF! Will someone at riot please fix this shit... i'm tired of dealing with this leaverbuster crap and not being able to reconnect to a game just because the client disconnects me and then screwing over the guys that get stuck in a game without me.

Is there anyone to speak with or anywhere to post in order to get some helpful action around here?

EDIT: now it let me reconnect... then when i connected to the game, it said we surrendered at 3:57 and i got leaverbustered again.., what the hell is going on man... can you guys please get this leaver buster crap off of me already...

I won't be able to remove those LPQ's since you do keep entering into matchmade queue's and disconnecting from the match. Make sure you're testing these troubleshooting steps in **custom games** until we're sure you won't get disconnected again. 

Since a repair wasn't able to help so far, let's move on to troubleshooting your network to make sure you can get a solid connection with our game servers. Run through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to go through each step and testing those changes in custom matches before hopping back into the queues.
okay will do. Thanks, i'll let you know how it goes.

Those LPQ's can sometimes be looked at as your client giving you a cry for help, trying to let you know that you need to troubleshoot your network before getting disconnected in even more games. Since you mentioned seeing errors, let's first try running a repair through the main client options. Test it in a custom game to make sure you don't get another LPQ.

Okay, ran the repair and it didn't say anything... it just loaded the client afterwards. I don't get the error regularly... just enough for it to have caused me to deal with this issue. Can you please get rid of the penalty somehow? I've now been sitting ehre for 30 minutes and after the repair, it will have taken me an entire hour just to get into a game after being penalized for something i didn't even do nor had ANY control over. This is extremely irritating man.

Don´t wanna make a thread for it, but sometimes I get a "Failed to create a dump file" error. Those errors are annoying since it forces the client to close and reopen with me not being able to select anything after that (if I´m unlucky I get a penalty for dodging because of not picking/banning). The game starts normally though after champ select counted to zero. 

Thought you may know what my problem is and if it is easy fixable.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fQEgEyWp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-31T21:22:27.406+0000)
>
> Those LPQ's can sometimes be looked at as your client giving you a cry for help, trying to let you know that you need to troubleshoot your network before getting disconnected in even more games. Since you mentioned seeing errors, let's first try running a repair through the main client options. Test it in a custom game to make sure you don't get another LPQ.

I just started the repair

I'll give that a shot.. i do have a low end PC, but it runs fine once i'm in game... this time, i just waited 20 minutes... then i hear the sound to ACCEPT the matchmaking and it never shows up... the client stops responding entirely and now i'll have had to wait 40 minutes just to get into a damn game. I don't troll, i don't verbally abuse people, i don't leave games or afk... i'd just like to play the game without having to waste 100-140 minutes of my day sitting around waiting just to maybe get 5 matches in...

So, i'll run the repair really quick... but the error it gives me has a "retry" button, but i have to alt-tab after i realize the client isn't responding anymore and it just disappears before i can even click "retry". Then when i try to quickly load the game again it just says i'm free to play another game because that game ended and in reality i'm getting leaverbustered...
